label: API Key
labelEdit: API Key (Leave empty to keep unchanged)
leaveEmptyDesc: Leave empty to keep existing key

warnings.looks_like_auth_header: Looks like you pasted a request header (e.g., Bearer/Authorization/x-api-key). Please enter the key value only.
warnings.wrapped_in_quotes: Wrapped in quotes. Usually the quotes are not needed.
warnings.contains_non_ascii: Contains non-ASCII characters. This is uncommon for API keys.
warnings.contains_whitespace: Contains whitespace (spaces/newlines). This is uncommon for API keys.
warnings.contains_uncommon_ascii: Contains uncommon symbols. This is uncommon for API keys.
